english_example_sentence: The diligent young person serving the community always receives respect.
russian_example_sentence: Трудолюбивый молодой человек, служащий обществу, всегда пользуется уважением.
turkish_example_sentence: Topluma hizmet eden çalışkan genç, her zaman saygı görür.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Topluma ______ çalışkan genç, her zaman saygı görür.
